Medium: 1 lithograph cut and glued to the fronts of 8 boxes and 2 bases; and marbleized papers and reproductions collaged onto sides, tops, and bottoms of 28 boxes and 2 wedge-shaped bases
Dimensions: Assembled (irreg.):  17 3/8 x 17 15/16 x variable  (min. 10 1/4") (44.3 x 45.5 x min. 26.0 cm)  Closed (irreg.):  6 5/8 x 17 1/2 x 10 3/8"  (16.8 x 44.4 x 26.4 cm)
